attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Before you do any more harm as Prime Minster & MP to this country and the people who once believed in you and the Labour Party.
We will never win an election again with you at the helm, you have been a disaster not only as the Chancellor of the Exchequer, but even more as the Prime Minster. You are just out of touch the English people of this once great country!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
